Module AOOP_Project
Package sound

Class SoundController

java.lang.Object
sound.SoundController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionObserver
public class SoundController extends Object implements ActionObserver
SoundController for the Game Under certain Conditions/ if the user inputs certain commands (like move player) the sound controller will be invoked per ObserverPattern and play a sound.
Author:
micha

    SoundController(boolean prefix)
